item.title: Machine Learning and differential equations?
item.description: Once in a while I hear the question: “how machine learning can have any connection with differential equations?

item.title: In search for algorithms that are fast with math!
item.description: Recently, I gave a presentation at AI4b.io symposium on accelerating Computational Fluid Dynamics with Machine Learning.
